content.prompt: Throughout the passage, the author advances her main point by employing which of the following methods?

choices.label: Analyzing the underlying causes of unusual jellyfish behavior in recent decades
Recounting multiple incidents that demonstrate the threat represented by jellyfish
Commenting on the impact of increasing jellyfish populations on international relations
Enumerating human actions that are endangering jellyfish populations

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
